form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF LAWFUL PER IENT RESIDENCE OF AN ALIEN, FORM NO. 43-RO368

full_text: UNITED Sereoned STATES by DEPARTMENT NARA 6/1/2023 OF JUSTICE FORM APPROVED. IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE OMB NO. 43-RO368 DATE FILED APPLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF FEE STAMP LAWFUL PER IENT RESIDENCE OF AN ALIEN In connection with immigrant visa application(s) of my relative(s) listed in item 15 below, I request that the 7 AM 13 American Consul at TIJUANA B. C. MEXICO in be furnished a verification of my lawful admission into the United (City and Country abroad) States for permanent residence. I have read and fully understand the instructions appearing on the reverse of this form concerning the desirability of attaching documentary evidence to prove relationship if the immigrant visa applicant is my parent, spouse, or unmarried child under the age of 21 years. 1. MY NAME IS (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) JOSE 2. MY ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER IS: JAUREGUI A 34 043 905 3. MAILING ADDRESS IN U.S. (Number and Street) (City) (State) (Zip Code) 7737 WHISETT AVE. LOS ANGELES CALIF. 4. PERMANENT ADDRESS IN THE U.S. (Number and Street) (City) (State) (Zip Code) none 5. MY DATE OF BIRTH IS: (Month) (Day) (Year) 6. MY PLACE OF BIRTH WAS: (City) (Country) 7. I AM NOW A CITIZEN OF: (Country) SEP. 4, 1942 JALISCO, MEXICO MEXICANA 8 MY FATHER'S NAME: 9. MY MOTHER'S FULL MAIDEN NAME: SANTIAGO JAUREGUI ANACLETA NUÑEZ DATA RELATING TO MY ADMISSION INTO THE UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE OR MY ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS TO PERMANENT RESIDENT 10. NAME USED WHEN ADMITTED OR PERMANENT RESIDENCE OR ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS TO PERMANENT RESIDENT (Last) 11. MY U.S. PORT OF ARRIVAL WAS: (First) (Middle) JAUREGUI JOSE NUÑEZ SAN YSIDRO, CALIF 12. MY DATE OF ARRIVAL OR ADJUSTMENT WAS: (Month) (Day) (Year) AND THE MEANS OF ARRIVAL WAS: (Show Name of Vessel or Airline and Flight No., etc.) NOV. 15, 1972 AFOOT 13. NAME AND ADDRESS OF PERSON IN THE U.S. TO WHOM I WAS DESTINED: CRUZ R. JAUREGUI, MY WIFE- LOS ANGELES, CA. is I first obtained an immigrant visa at a United States consular office abroad on (date) (location). At that time, I xwas was not married. SAN YSIDRO, CALIF. NOV. 15, 1972 Including my present marriage I have been married ONE times. The name of my present spouse is: CRUZ RIVERA to >whom I was married on MAY 22, 1972 at LOS ANGELES, CALIF. My present spouse is (Check One) (date) (location) a U. S. Citizen a permanent resident neither of these. If married more than one time, list names of previous spouse(s) and places and dates of marriage and explain how marriage(s) were terminated: RELATIONSHIP FATHER SANTIAGO PERSONS Company JAUREGUI ADDRESS 16. THE IN WHOSE BEHALF SUCH INFORMATION IS REQUESTED ARE AS FOLLOWS: FULL NAME DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH JALISCO, MEXICO P.O. BOX 701- MEXICALI, B.C. MEXICO 08/21/73 FULL NAME DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH RET. DOCS. SEEN AND RELATIONSHIP ADDRESS FULL NAME DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH [] D/C pet/ben RELATIONSHIP ADDRESS 0 Adoption M/C NOT TO BE FILLED OUT BY APPLICANT 17. FULL SIGNATURE OF ARRIGANT AS NOW USED The Secretary of State is hereby informed that the applicant named above was -was-not lawfully admitted for permanent residence. Jose on His "A" file shows date of first admission for permanent residence as 11-15-72 symbol IR-1 , issuing post and date of issuance of IV. marital status at time of first admission - Single; Married; Divorced; Widowed. File does does not establish relationship between applicant herein and visa applicant. Verification made from Form I-151 personally presented by applicant showing lawful permanent residence of: INS OFFICE: Los LAWFUR ADMISSION VERIFIED Date: 5-31-73 Verifier: Ozone FORM 1.550 (REV. 2.1.73)
